analyzed: āśvamedhikam parva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_14.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
yaśaḥ śaśāṅka uśeṣe stam prayāte bhīṣma bhāsvati
papāta dharmatanayaḥ śoka mlāna mukha ambujaḥ
moha mūrcchā ākule tasmin viṣaṇṇe saha bāndhavaiḥ
śucam saṃstambhya śanakais dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ tam abravīt
uttiṣṭha pṛthivīpāla na dhairyam hātum arhasi
saṃsāra asāra caritam munibhyaḥ śrutavān asi
śokasya avasaraḥ na ayam svadharmāt acyutasya te
pāhi sattva sudhā sindho prajāpatiḥ iva prajāḥ
śocitavyaḥ mama eva ayam kālaḥ samucitaḥ dhunā

original: vidurasya giro yena na śrutāḥ sunayojjvalāḥ // Bhmj_14.6 //
analyzed: vidurasya giraḥ yena na śrutāḥ su naya ujjvalāḥ
iti ukte dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kṣmāpālam abhyadhāt

original: mā śucaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa labdhāṃ bhuṅkṣva mahīmimām // Bhmj_14.7 //
analyzed: mā śucaḥ kṣatra dharmeṇa labdhām bhuṅkṣva mahīm imām
duḥkhibhyaḥ hi palāyante dhairya āyattāḥ vibhūtayaḥ
yajasva vijayī rājan pāpa śaṅkā apanuttaye
aśvamedhena vidhinā yātaḥ tad yogya tām asi
etat muni vacaḥ śrutvā yajñe baddha manorathaḥ
dhana mūlām kriyam matvā rājya kośam acintayat
saḥ tha sarvān samāhūya kośa adhyakṣān makha utsukaḥ

original: tebhyaḥ śuśrāva sarvasvaṃ kṣayitaṃ yudhi kauravaiḥ /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śuśrāva sarva svam kṣayitam yudhi kauravaiḥ

original: aśvamedhe nirāśaṃ taṃ vijñāya draviṇaṃ vinā // Bhmj_14.11 //
analyzed: aśvamedhe nirāśam tam vijñāya draviṇam vinā
uvāca karuṇā sindhuḥ vyāsaḥ nirvāpayan iva
maruttasya kṣitipateḥ yajña śeṣam himācale
kāñcanam vidyate bhūri yajña artham tat avāpsyasi
śrutvā etat pāṇḍu putreṇa maruttasya mahīpateḥ
mahā yajña kathām pṛṣṭaḥ provāca muni puṃgavaḥ

original: mahīyasi manorvaṃśe mahatāṃ yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_14.14 //
analyzed: mahīyasi manoḥ vaṃśe mahatām yaśasām nidhiḥ
karaṃdhama kule śrīmān maruttaḥ bhūt mahīpatiḥ

original: tamandraḥ spardhate nityaṃ na sa śaknoti ceṣṭitaiḥ // Bhmj_14.15 //
analyzed: tam andraḥ spardhate nityam na sa śaknoti ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: yadā tadā manyutapto rahaḥ prāha bṛhaspatim /
analyzed: yadā tadā manyu taptaḥ rahaḥ prāha bṛhaspatim
karaṃdhamaḥ bhavat yājyaḥ tvad pituḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
kramāt tava api tad sūnuḥ maruttaḥ tad guṇa adhikaḥ
kiṃtu tad darpa saṃgharṣāt bhavantam aham arthaye
na yājaka padam tasya gantavyam bhavatā adhunā
iti arthitaḥ maghavatā tathā iti ūce bṛhaspatiḥ

original: adyaprabhṛti martyo me na yājya iti saṃvidā /
analyzed: adya prabhṛti martyaḥ me na yājyaḥ iti saṃvidā
atrā antare narapatiḥ maruttaḥ vipulam kratum
āhartum kṛta saṃkalpaḥ bṛhaspatim upāyayau
sa tena abhyarthitaḥ yatnāt yājakaḥ stu bhavān iti
na cakāra abhyupagamam śakra praṇaya yantritaḥ

original: pratyākhyātaḥ sa guruṇā rājā lajjānatānanaḥ // Bhmj_14.21 //
analyzed: pratyākhyātaḥ sa guruṇā rājā lajjā nata ānanaḥ
vrajan vinaṣṭa saṃkalpaḥ dadarśa pathi nāradam

original: nārado 'pi tamālokya pṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tatkathām // Bhmj_14.22 //
analyzed: tam ālokya pṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tad kathām

original: uvāca tyaja saṃtāpaṃ mā rājanvimanā bhava /
analyzed: uvāca tyaja saṃtāpam mā rājan vimanāḥ bhava
saṃvarta ākhyaḥ nidhiḥ dhāmnām anujaḥ sti bṛhaspateḥ
svacchanda cārī yogi indraḥ vārāṇasyām sa vartate

original: saṃvartaḥ sa parijñeyo vrajethāḥ śaraṇaṃ tu tam // Bhmj_14.24 //
analyzed: saṃvartaḥ sa parijñeyaḥ vrajethāḥ śaraṇam tu tam
niveditaḥ ham kena iti pṛṣṭaḥ tena tu a mānataḥ

original: bravīthā nārado mahyaṃ tvāmihasthaṃ nyavedayat // Bhmj_14.25 //
analyzed: bravīthāḥ nāradaḥ mahyam tvām ihastham nyavedayat
kathayitvā prahṛṣṭaḥ ca jvalitam jātavedasam

original: ityuktvā prārthayethāstaṃ yājakaṃ yajvanāṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_14.26 //
analyzed: iti uktvā prārthayethāḥ tam yājakam yajvanām varaḥ
nāradena iti abhihite bhūpālaḥ harṣa nirbharaḥ

original: taduktaṃ vidadhe sarvaṃ gatvā vāraṇasīṃ svayam // Bhmj_14.27 //
analyzed: tat uktam vidadhe sarvam gatvā vāraṇasīm svayam

original: saṃtyaktonmattarūpaṃ sa prāpya taṃ yājakaṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: saṃtyakta unmatta rūpam sa prāpya tam yājakam nṛpaḥ
cakāra tad anujñātaḥ tapaḥ himagireḥ taṭe
tapasā yajña vitta arthī devam ārādhya śaṃkaram

original: anekameruvipulaṃ lebhe hema sa pārthivaḥ // Bhmj_14.29 //
analyzed: aneka meru vipulam lebhe hema sa pārthivaḥ
haimeṣu sarva bhāṇḍeṣu raciteṣu atha śilpibhiḥ
saṃpūrṇaḥ yajña saṃbhāraḥ prāvartata mahībhujaḥ
samṛddhim atulām tasya yajñe jñātvā bṛhaspatiḥ

original: saṃvartakaṃ yājakaṃ ca saṃtaptastanutāṃ yayau // Bhmj_14.31 //
analyzed: saṃvartakam yājakam ca saṃtaptaḥ tanu tām yayau
sa śoka kāraṇam pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa mlāna mānasaḥ
marutta yajña vibhavam bhrātṛ spardhā ākulaḥ vadat
tatas śatakratuḥ tasya prītye guru vatsalaḥ

original: uvāca vahnimāhūya maruttaṃ vraja pārthivam // Bhmj_14.33 //
analyzed: uvāca vahnim āhūya maruttam vraja pārthivam

original: gatvā madvacasā vācyaḥ sa ca rājā tvayā kratau /
analyzed: gatvā mad vacasā vācyaḥ sa ca rājā tvayā kratau

original: yathā saṃvartakaṃ tyaktvā bhavedyājyo bṛhaspateḥ // Bhmj_14.34 //
analyzed: yathā saṃvartakam tyaktvā bhavet yājyaḥ bṛhaspateḥ
iti uktaḥ surarājena gatvā vahniḥ narādhipam
śakra saṃdeśam avadat na ca rājā abhyamanyata
tatas pratinivṛttaḥ tha punar gaccha iti vajriṇā
preritaḥ pāvakaḥ vādīt saṃvarta bhaya kampitaḥ

original: sa tatra brahmacārī māmūce saṃvartakaḥ krudhā /
analyzed: sa tatra brahmacārī mām ūce saṃvartakaḥ krudhā

original: tejorāśiḥ śapeyaṃ tvāṃ sameṣyasi punaryadi // Bhmj_14.37 //
analyzed: tejaḥ rāśiḥ śapeyam tvām sameṣyasi punar yadi
śrutvā etat kātaraḥ si iti tam jagāda puraṃdaraḥ

original: jvalanaḥ pratyuvācātha taṃ kopahaviṣā jvalan // Bhmj_14.38 //
analyzed: jvalanaḥ pratyuvāca atha tam kopa haviṣā jvalan
aho nu brahma kopa agniḥ ahalyā vallabhasya te

original: pramādādatha kopādvā mohādvā śakra vismṛtaḥ // Bhmj_14.39 //
analyzed: pramādāt atha kopāt vā mohāt vā śakra vismṛtaḥ
sa yadā cyavanaḥ kopāt mahā daṃṣṭram mahā asuram

original: asṛjattvadvadhāyograṃ tadā dhairyaṃ kva te gatam // Bhmj_14.40 //
analyzed: asṛjat tvad vadhāya ugram tadā dhairyam kva te gatam
duḥsahāḥ brāhmaṇa ruṣaḥ nirdahanti jagat kṣaṇāt

original: ukte hutāśaneneti na śaktaḥ kiṃcidabravīt // Bhmj_14.41 //
analyzed: ukte hutāśanena iti na śaktaḥ kiṃcid abravīt
visṛṣṭaḥ punar indreṇa gandharva adhipatiḥ nṛpam

original: ūce guruṃ bhajasveti na ca rājā tamagrahīt // Bhmj_14.42 //
analyzed: ūce gurum bhajasva iti na ca rājā tam agrahīt
tatas kruddhaḥ svayam vajrī garjan gambhīra niḥsvanaḥ
yajña aṅganam narapateḥ vyomnā meghaiḥ vṛtaḥ yayau
prabhāvena atha mahatā saṃvartasya ugra tejasaḥ
śatamanyu samutsṛṣṭam vajram meghān samāviśat
tad mantra śaktyā vivaśaḥ vṛtrahā
āyayau saha bhāga arhaiḥ tridaśaiḥ soma pīthibhiḥ
pūjitaḥ tha maruttena śānta manyuḥ śatakratuḥ
yajña kriyā parikare paricaryā paraḥ bhavat
tad ājñayā surāḥ sarve yajña saṃbhāra kāriṇaḥ
babhūvuḥ bhūmipālasya nideśa vaśa gāḥ ciram
evam tasya indra jayinaḥ rājñaḥ saṃvarta tejasā

original: nirvighnaḥ pūrṇatāṃ prāpa yajñaḥ kanakavarṣiṇaḥ // Bhmj_14.48 //
analyzed: nirvighnaḥ pūrṇa tām prāpa yajñaḥ kanaka varṣiṇaḥ
tad śeṣa dviṇena tvam hayamedha mahā makham
prayataḥ prāpnuhi iti uktaḥ ava virarāma muni īśvaraḥ
saṃvartamaruttīyam   /
munibhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ tathā
aśvamedha dhṛta udyogaḥ dhṛtim lebhe yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
draṣṭum tatas prajā kāryam pravṛtte dharmanandane
antardadhe tam āmantrya sarvam tat muni maṇḍalam
hema ratna latā kānte vikāsi kanaka ambuje

original: atha kṛṣṇau sabhodyāne svairaṃ prītyā vijahvatuḥ // Bhmj_14.52 //
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇau sabhā udyāne svairam prītyā vijahvatuḥ
kathā ante tatra kaṃsārim subhadrā vallabhaḥ vadat

original: yuddhārambhe tvayoktaṃ yatsarvaṃ tanmama vismṛtam // Bhmj_14.53 //
analyzed: yuddha ārambhe tvayā uktam yat sarvam tat mama vismṛtam
visṛṣṭam parama artha jña jñānam tat punar ucyatām
iti uktaḥ pāṇḍu putreṇa viṣaṇṇaḥ keśavaḥ bravīt
aho tvayā avadhānena na śrutam tat abuddhinā

original: na śakyate punarvaktuṃ tathāpi śrūyatāmidam // Bhmj_14.55 //
analyzed: na śakyate punar vaktum tathā api śrūyatām idam
brāhmaṇena purā kaścid jīvanmukta daśām śritaḥ
siddhaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ vadat sarvam vijñāya bhava vibhramam
asmin asatya saṃghāte bhūtānām pāñcabhautike
guṇaiḥ nibaddhaḥ pakṣī iva jīvaḥ tiṣṭhati pañjare
ahaṃkāra eka sārāṇām dehinām vismṛta ātmanām
cakra vat parivartante sukha duḥkha kṣaya udayāḥ
dehānte karma saṃsargāt jantavaḥ śubha duṣkṛtaiḥ

original: tārārūpā vimānāni bhajante narakāṇi vā // Bhmj_14.59 //
analyzed: tārā rūpāḥ vimānāni bhajante narakāṇi vā
tatas bhoga kṣaye garbham jarāyu pariveṣṭitam
śukra rūpaḥ viśati ātmā yonyām śoṇita saṃplutaḥ
niḥśvāsa agraiḥ yathā vāri līyate darpaṇa udare

original: nirdhūtasya yathā vahnerūṣmā vyomni prasarpati // Bhmj_14.61 //
analyzed: nirdhūtasya yathā vahneḥ ūṣmā vyomni prasarpati
yathā vā kusuma āmodaḥ praviśati antare nile

original: rāgaḥ saṃkrāntimāyāti sarandhre sphaṭike yathā // Bhmj_14.62 //
analyzed: rāgaḥ saṃkrāntim āyāti sa randhre sphaṭike yathā
tathā durlakṣya saṃcāraḥ garbham ātmā pradhāvati
bibhrāṇaḥ vāsanām antar śīta sparśam iva anilaḥ
jātasya jāyate tasya vardhamānasya vardhate
tṛṣṇā tanturbhiḥ vi

original: sasyeva śuṣyato na tu śuṣyati // Bhmj_14.64 //
analyzed: sasyā iva śuṣyataḥ na tu śuṣyati
vivekāt duḥkha saṃyogāt vairāgyam gāḍham āśritaḥ
na aham asasmi iti mantreṇa mucyate brahma dīkṣitaḥ
pūrvam bhāveṣu nirvāṇaḥ tatas kāraṇa vṛttiṣu
nirālamba daśām etya yogī brahmaṇi līyate
sarvatas pāṇi caraṇam sarva vyāpinam avyayam

original: ātmānaṃ sa parijñāya satyāmetāṃ bhavasthitim // Bhmj_14.67 //
analyzed: ātmānam sa parijñāya satyām etām bhava sthitim
iti uktvā brāhmaṇam siddhaḥ sahasā antaradhīyata

original: idamanyacca kaunteya śreyase prayataḥ śṛṇu // Bhmj_14.68 //
analyzed: idam anyat ca kaunteya śreyase prayataḥ śṛṇu
uvāca brāhmaṇī kācid bhartāram vijane purā

original: gamiṣyāmi gatiṃ sādhvī kāmahaṃ tvatparāyaṇā // Bhmj_14.69 //
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi gatim sādhvī kām aham tvad parāyaṇā
iti pṛṣṭaḥ tayā vipraḥ tām uvāca smita ānanaḥ

original: agnirvaiśvānaro nāma sthito 'ntaḥ kila dehinām // Bhmj_14.70 //
analyzed: agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ nāma sthitaḥ ntar kila dehinām
indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ tasya saptārciṣaḥ smṛtāḥ
viṣayāḥ ca asya samidhaḥ bhoktāraḥ sapta ca ṛtvijaḥ

original: tasminhate sarvamidaṃ jāyate ca punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_14.71 //
analyzed: tasmin hate sarvam idam jāyate ca punar punar
indriyāṇi iva manasaḥ manaḥ teṣām ca sarvadā
paraspara upakāreṇa prīyate deha saṃgame
manaḥ buddhi prabhṛtayaḥ sapta indriya mṛgāḥ purā

original: atarkeṇaiva nihatā rājñā yogamayaiḥ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_14.73 //
analyzed: atarkeṇa eva nihatāḥ rājñā yoga mayaiḥ śaraiḥ
jita indriyasya no kiṃcid idam tasya eva ca akhilam
viṣayāḥ viṣayasya iti janakaḥ vipram abhyadāt
tasmāt asakta manasā dṛṣṭvā sarvam idam mayā
tyaktam parāvara jñena bhava āvirbhāva śāntaye
gatiḥ tava api kalyāṇi mad bhāva sadṛśī sadā
brahma araṇī samudbhūtam jānīhi jñāna pāvakam
etat patyuḥ vacaḥ śrutvā brāhmaṇī tattva darśinī
kṣetra kṣetrajña vijñānam param prāvīṇyam āyayau
śrutvā etat arjunaḥ kṛṣṇam babhāṣe vismaya ākulaḥ

original: yogīndro brāhmaṇaḥ ko 'sau kvāste vā sā ca tadvadhūḥ // Bhmj_14.78 //
analyzed: yogi indraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ sau kva āste vā sā ca tad vadhūḥ
iti uktaḥ kaiṭabhārātiḥ punar ūce dhanaṃjayam

original: śiṣyeṇa pṛṣṭaḥ sarvajñaḥ purā gururabhāṣata // Bhmj_14.79 //
analyzed: śiṣyeṇa pṛṣṭaḥ sarvajñaḥ purā guruḥ abhāṣata
bṛhaspati prabhṛtibhiḥ muni indraiḥ sarva darśibhiḥ
śrutā iyam bhava viccheda kathā proktā svayaṃbhuvā
guṇatraya nibaddhānām karma bheda vikāriṇām
bhāvaḥ yam prāṇinām śaśvat alpaḥ pyāyāti analpa tām
vicitraḥ kila sargaḥ yam ahaṃkārāt vinirgataḥ

original: tasminneva layaṃ yāti śvabhre puṣpacayo yathā // Bhmj_14.82 //
analyzed: tasmin eva layam yāti śvabhre puṣpa cayaḥ yathā
janmāntara śata abhyāsāt antaraṅga tvam āgataḥ

original: ahaṃkāraḥ sa manaso līlayā kena bhedyate // Bhmj_14.83 //
analyzed: ahaṃkāraḥ sa manasaḥ līlayā kena bhedyate
avidyā tānavena eva śanais saṃnyasta karmaṇaḥ
vikalpa dvaṃdva viratau jñāna ālokaḥ prajāyate
jñāna agninā pravṛddhena dagdhvā bhava viṣa drumam
sarva granthi vinirmuktaḥ parama amṛtam aśnute

original: iti brahmoditaṃ jñānaṃ śiṣyāya guruṇā purā /
analyzed: iti brahma uditam jñānam śiṣyāya guruṇā purā
nānā nidarśana upetam kathitam bhava śāntaye

original: ahameva guruḥ pārtha śiṣyaśca tvaṃ samo mama /
analyzed: aham eva guruḥ pārtha śiṣyaḥ ca tvam samaḥ mama
iti uktvā jñāna sarvasvam virarāma janārdanaḥ
anugītāḥ

original: tato vihṛtya suciraṃ prītyā kṛṣṇaḥ kirīṭinā /
analyzed: tatas vihṛtya su ciram prītyā kṛṣṇaḥ kirīṭinā
dvārakā gamane cakre matim bandhu jana utsukaḥ

original: sa gatvā nṛpamāmantrya dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca sānugam /
analyzed: sa gatvā nṛpam āmantrya dhṛtarāṣṭram ca sa anugam

original: āśvāsya kṛṣṇāṃ kuntīṃ ca praṇamyādāya cānujām // Bhmj_14.89 //
analyzed: āśvāsya kṛṣṇām kuntīm ca praṇamya ādāya ca anujām
aśvamedhe sameṣyāmi punar kṛtvā iti saṃvidam
dāruka prerita rathaḥ pratasthe garuḍadhvajaḥ
sa vrajan sātyaki sakhaḥ tejaḥ rañjita diṅmukhaḥ

original: uttaṅkaṃ tapasāṃ rāśimāluloke muniḥ pathi // Bhmj_14.91 //
analyzed: uttaṅkam tapasām rāśim āluloke muniḥ pathi

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sādaraṃ śauriḥ praṇamya racitāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā sa ādaram śauriḥ praṇamya racita añjaliḥ
kuśalam vīta vairāṇām papraccha āśrama vāsinām
uttaṅkaḥ pi harim dṛṣṭvā prīti pūrvam anāmayam

original: ūce kaccittvayā sāmnā rakṣitaṃ bhārataṃ kulam // Bhmj_14.93 //
analyzed: ūce kaccit tvayā sāmnā rakṣitam bhāratam kulam
kaccit duryodhanaḥ rājā dharmaputraḥ ca sa anugau

original: sthitau vigatasaṃgharṣau tvadbuddhyā paitrike pade // Bhmj_14.94 //
analyzed: sthitau vigata saṃgharṣau tvad buddhyā paitrike pade
iti uttaṅkena govindaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tam pratyabhāṣata

original: bhāratānāṃ mune yatnaḥ paraḥ saṃdhau kṛto mayā // Bhmj_14.95 //
analyzed: bhāratānām mune yatnaḥ paraḥ saṃdhau kṛtaḥ mayā
hita muktaḥ bahuśas kauravaḥ vidura ādibhiḥ

original: na jagrāha kṛtāntena daivena ca vimohitaḥ // Bhmj_14.96 //
analyzed: na jagrāha kṛtāntena daivena ca vimohitaḥ
nirbandhāt kururājasya rādheya muni vartinaḥ

original: nihatāḥ pārthivāḥ sarve śeṣāḥ pañcaiva pāṇḍavāḥ // Bhmj_14.97 //
analyzed: nihatāḥ pārthivāḥ sarve śeṣāḥ pañca eva pāṇḍavāḥ
etat śrutvā muniḥ kopāt jvalita anala saṃnibhaḥ

original: tamūce vakramanasā te tvayaiva nipātitāḥ // Bhmj_14.98 //
analyzed: tam ūce vakra manasā te tvayā eva nipātitāḥ
śaktena api tvayā kṛṣṇa yasmāt pārtha hita eṣiṇā

original: upekṣitaḥ kṣayo ghorastasmācchāpaṃ dadāni te // Bhmj_14.99 //
analyzed: upekṣitaḥ kṣayaḥ ghoraḥ tasmāt śāpam dadāni te
uttaṅkena iti abhihite babhāṣe kaiṭabhāntakaḥ

original: jānāmi tejasāṃ rāśiṃ tvāmuttaṅka taponidhim // Bhmj_14.100 //
analyzed: jānāmi tejasām rāśim tvām uttaṅka tapaḥ nidhim

original: kiṃtu nārhasi kopena tīvraṃ kartuṃ tapovyayam /
analyzed: kiṃtu nā arhasi kopena tīvram kartum tapaḥ vyayam

original: tamo hi duḥsahaṃ ghoraṃ krodho mṛtyuḥ śarīriṇām // Bhmj_14.101 //
analyzed: tamaḥ hi duḥsaham ghoram krodhaḥ mṛtyuḥ śarīriṇām
na adya api naṣṭa mohaḥ si nanu na adya api paśyasi

original: kiṃ na jānāsi māṃ sarvaṃ sarvavyāpinamavyayam // Bhmj_14.102 //
analyzed: kim na jānāsi mām sarvam sarva vyāpinam avyayam
sarva deva mayaḥ kartā viśva ātmā jagatām aham
iti ukte puṣkarākṣeṇa śānta kopaḥ bravīt muniḥ

original: jāne tvāṃ kiṃ tu taddivyaṃ draṣṭumicchāmi te vapuḥ /
analyzed: jāne tvām kim tu tat divyam draṣṭum icchāmi te vapuḥ
iti arthitaḥ muni indreṇa viśva āviṣkāra līlayā
śakti prakāśa paripūrita saṃvid agre rekhā sphurat druhiṇa rudra mahā indra candram
dhāma traya uttaram anaśvaram aiśvaram tat dṛṣṭvā vapuḥ muni varaḥ bhavat asta mohaḥ
tatas stotraiḥ uttaṅkena viṣṇuḥ bhaktyā namaskṛtaḥ

original: tadgirā svavapuḥ saumyaṃ tadeva punarādade // Bhmj_14.106 //
analyzed: tad girā sva vapuḥ saumyam tat eva punar ādade
saṃnidhi te vidhāsyāmi sarvatas smaraṇāt mune
iti uktvā tam samāmantrya prāyāt garuḍa ketanaḥ
tatas kadācid sa muniḥ jala arthī maru dhanvasu
caran dadarśa caṇḍālam dhanuṣpāṇim jala pradam
gṛhāṇa iti asakṛt tena prārthitaḥ muniḥ yadā
na jagrāha aśuci jalam uttaṅkaḥ ntardadhe tadā
tatas sametya bhagavān svayam viṣṇuḥ tam abravīt

original: mune madvacasā śakraḥ sudhāṃ tvāṃ dātumāyayau // Bhmj_14.110 //
analyzed: mune mad vacasā śakraḥ sudhām tvām dātum āyayau

original: jalado na sa cāṇḍālo mithyā śaṅkā tavābhavat /
analyzed: jala daḥ na sa cāṇḍālaḥ mithyā śaṅkā tava abhavat

original: pratyākhyātaḥ sa yanmohānna tadyuktaṃ tvayā kṛtam // Bhmj_14.111 //
analyzed: pratyākhyātaḥ sa yat mohāt na tat yuktam tvayā kṛtam
adhunā mad varāt te stu sa amṛtaiḥ jala nirjharaiḥ

original: pūriteyaṃ marumahī nigadyeti yayau hariḥ // Bhmj_14.112 //
analyzed: pūritā iyam maru mahī nigadya iti yayau hariḥ
evam saḥ uttaṅkaḥ yaśasām nidhiḥ
durlabham darśanam viṣṇoḥ sa anugraham avāptavān

original: āsādya paramaṃ jñānaṃ yaḥ purā gurusevayā /
analyzed: āsādya paramam jñānam yaḥ purā guru sevayā

original: taddakṣiṇārthī prayayau rājñaḥ pauṣasya mandiram // Bhmj_14.114 //
analyzed: tad dakṣiṇā arthī prayayau rājñaḥ pauṣasya mandiram
kuṇḍale prāpya rucire vitīrṇe pauṣa bhāryayā

original: hṛte ca dṛṣṭvā nāśena jīviteśarasātalam // Bhmj_14.115 //
analyzed: hṛte ca dṛṣṭvā nāśena jīviteśa rasātalam
jitvā nāgān samāsādya te purā ratna kuṇḍale

original: yo dadau gurubhāryāyai kṛtakṛtyo babhūva ca // Bhmj_14.116 //
analyzed: yaḥ dadau guru bhāryāyai kṛtakṛtyaḥ babhūva ca
uttaṅka viśvarūpa darśanam
yāte dvāravatīm kṛṣṇe yādava ānanda dāyini
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saha amātyaḥ yajña kāryam acintayat

original: sa gatvā sānujaḥ śailaṃ śrīkaṇṭhadayitaṃ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: sa gatvā sa anujaḥ śailam śrīkaṇṭha dayitam śanais

original: ārādhya tapasā rudraṃ devadevaṃ pinākinam // Bhmj_14.118 //
analyzed: ārādhya tapasā rudram devadevam pinākinam
upahāreṇa vidhinā muhūrte śubha śaṃsini

original: abhyarcya guhyakādhīśaṃ maṇibhadraṃ ca sānugam // Bhmj_14.119 //
analyzed: abhyarcya guhyaka adhīśam maṇibhadram ca sa anugam
munibhiḥ tarpite vahnau dhaumyena ca purodhasā
lebhe pāṇaḍu sutaḥ śrīmān marutta nihitam nidhim
pṛthu pramāṇa rūpāṇi bhāsvanti vividhāni ca
hema bhāṇḍa sahasrāṇi ratna bhāra śatāni ca

original: uṣṭrāṇāṃ śakaṭānāṃ ca hayānāṃ kariṇāṃ tathā /
analyzed: uṣṭrāṇām śakaṭānām ca hayānām kariṇām tathā
daśa lakṣāṇi tat vittam anayat hastināpuram

original: mahiṣāṇāṃ svarāṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ gavāṃ tathā /
analyzed: mahiṣāṇām svarāṇām ca puruṣāṇām gavām tathā

original: na babhūva tadā saṃkhyā vahatāṃ bhūri kāñcanam // Bhmj_14.123 //
analyzed: na babhūva tadā saṃkhyā vahatām bhūri kāñcanam
akṣayyam kośam ādāya prāpte sva puram nṛpe
sahitaḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ sarvaiḥ āyayau madhusūdanaḥ
etasmin eva samaye saubhadra mahiṣī sutam
droṇaputra astra nirdagdham asūta gata jīvitam
uttarāyāḥ sutaḥ jātaḥ strīṇām iti utsava svanaḥ
vyasuḥ vyasuḥ ca iti abhavat saḥ eva rodana dhvaniḥ
bāla pravāla kalikā komala avayave śiśau
jāte nirjīvite śokāt mumoha jananī janaḥ

original: tataḥ kuntī subhadrā ca sametya karuṇānidhim /
analyzed: tatas kuntī subhadrā ca sametya karuṇā nidhim
bāṣpa saṃdigdhayā vācā rukmiṇī patim ūcatuḥ
svasreyasya yaśaḥ mūrteḥ abhimanyoḥ priyasya te
bālasya bālaḥ tanayaḥ jātaḥ gata jīvanaḥ
karuṇā ārdre niśamya etat bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
viveśa sūtikā veśma śauriḥ kalaśa bhūṣitam
ratna dīpta aṃśu kapiśam dīpta oṣadhi śata ācitam
mantraiḥ bhiṣagbhiḥ śikhinā śastraiḥ astraiḥ ca rakṣitam
atha uttarā prāpya saṃjñām śīta vāribhiḥ ukṣitā

original: tamaṅke śiśumādāya vilalāpa hareḥ puraḥ // Bhmj_14.132 //
analyzed: tam aṅke śiśum ādāya vilalāpa hareḥ puras
tatas jalada gambhīra ghoṣaḥ śauriḥ abhāṣata

original: dṛśā pīyūṣavarṣiṇyā vilokya śanakaiḥ śiśum // Bhmj_14.133 //
analyzed: dṛśā pīyūṣa varṣiṇyā vilokya śanakais śiśum
satyāt dvijebhyaḥ dharmāt ca yathā na anyat priyam mama
tena satyena bālaḥ yama astra muktaḥ jīvatu
mādhavena iti abhihite labdha jīvaḥ sa bālakaḥ
sūrya aṃśubhiḥ iva spṛṣṭaḥ babhūva ambuja korakaḥ
tatas pravṛtte vipule sahasā nagara utsave
nabhaścarāṇām api āsi iti asādhu sādhu iti niḥsvanaḥ
parikṣīṇe kuru laye yasmāt jātaḥ yam arbhakaḥ
tasmāt parīkṣit nāmnā astu jagāda iti atha keśavaḥ
vyāsa ājñayā tatas rājñaḥ yajña yogyaḥ mahādhanaḥ
prāvartata uru ratna āḍhyaḥ saṃbhāraḥ bahu kautukaḥ
athā utsṛjya vidhānena kṛṣṇa śāram turaṅgamam
rakṣitam pāṇḍu putreṇa svayam gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
babhūva caitra śukla ante dīkṣitaḥ dharmanandanaḥ
tatas trigarta viṣayam prāpte yajña turaṅgame
rāja putraiḥ abhūt yuddham tumulam savyasācinaḥ
yudhiṣṭhira ājñā tasya abhūt na hantavyāḥ nṛpāḥ iti

original: tāṃ smarannāvadhīdbhūpānsa vijigye tu kevalam // Bhmj_14.142 //
analyzed: tām smaran na avadhīt bhūpān sa vijigye tu kevalam
prāgjyotiṣa īśvaram vīram bhagadatta ātmajam yudhi
tribhiḥ dinaiḥ vajradattam jitvā
saindhavaiḥ akarot yuddham su ciram krūra yodhibhiḥ
pāda cārī raṇe pārthaḥ ratha kuñjara vartibhiḥ
pautram jayadrathasya atha śiśum ādāya duḥśalā
savyasācinam āsādya babhāṣe sa aśru locanā
bhrātar tvayi samāyāte tvad nāma eva niśamya me
putraḥ jāyadrathiḥ yātaḥ pañcatām sphaṭita āśayaḥ
tad sutaḥ mama pautraḥ yam svasraya tanayaḥ tava
rakṣyaḥ sarva ātmanā iti uktvā ruroda dhṛtarāṣṭra jā
viṣaṇṇāḥ tām samāśvāsya pārthaḥ bāṣpa ārdra locanaḥ
nindat nijām kṣattra jātim jagāma turaga anugaḥ
śvetāśvam aśva goptāram maṇipūra puram tatas

original: prāptaṃ pratyudyayau rājā tatputro babhruvāhanaḥ // Bhmj_14.149 //
analyzed: prāptam pratyudyayau rājā tad putraḥ babhruvāhanaḥ

original: pūjāmādāya tanayaṃ namraṃ dṛṣṭvā puraḥ sthitam /
analyzed: pūjām ādāya tanayam namram dṛṣṭvā puras sthitam
yuddha arthī śakratanayaḥ na abhyanandat kṛtāñjalim

original: dṛṣṭvā māṃ sāyudhaṃ prāptaṃ sāmnā pratyudyato 'si kim /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mām sa āyudham prāptam sāmnā pratyudyataḥ si kim
dhik tvām a kṣattriyam bhīrum iti ūce tam dhanaṃjayaḥ
atrā antare mahīm bhittvā samutthāya uraga aṅganā
bhartuḥ pāṇḍu sutasya agre babhāṣe babhruvāhanam
yuddhena tuṣyati pitā tava ayam su bhaṭa priyaḥ
vīra saṃtāna saphalā śaurya śrīḥ abhimāninām

original: ityuktaḥ sa tayā dhanvī rathaṃ hemaharidhvajam /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa tayā dhanvī ratham hema hari dhvajam
āruhya āmukta kavacaḥ pitaram yoddhum āyayau
tatas śara śataiḥ viddhaḥ tena śrāntaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ
ānanda nirbharaḥ tasya praśaśaṃsa parākramam
gāṇḍīvadhanvanā muktān nārācān vajra gauravān
aprāptān eva ciccheda śaraiḥ citrāṅgadā sutaḥ
athā unmamātha putrasya syandanam śakranandanaḥ
hema pattra latā citram udyānam iva mārutaḥ
vilokya viratham putram yudhyamānam asaṃbhramam
manda prayatna śithilān prāhiṇot vijayaḥ śarān
atha tīkṣṇena hṛdaye pattriṇā babhruvāhanaḥ
vajreṇa iva acala bhidā jaghāna śvetavāhanam
avadhye sarva bhūtānām putreṇa nihateḥ june

original: nādo babhūva gagane hā heti tridivaukasām // Bhmj_14.160 //
analyzed: nādaḥ babhūva gagane hā hā iti tridivaukasām
pitaram patitam dṛṣṭvā śakra ketum iva kṣitau
mumoha nindan ātmānam tyakta cāpaḥ ūrjuna ātmajaḥ
atha citrāṅgadā abhyetya putreṇa nihatam patim
vilokya śoka saṃpannā vilalāpa sumadhyamā

original: aho bata cirādetya jāyāyā mama mandiram /
analyzed: aho bata cirāt etya jāyāyāḥ mama mandiram
ārya putra tvayā ātithyam prāptam putrāt balīyasaḥ
aho nu hata bhāgyā aham cira viproṣitam patim

original: tvāṃ prāptaṃ nayanānandaṃ paśyāmi nihataṃ kṣitau // Bhmj_14.164 //
analyzed: tvām prāptam nayana ānandam paśyāmi nihatam kṣitau
iti uktvā gāḍham āliṅgya sā patim bāṣpa gadgadā
ulūpī nāga tanayā bhuvi citrāṅgadā apatat
labdha saṃjñaḥ śoka ārtaḥ pralapan babhruvāhanaḥ
śarīra tyāga niyamam cakre kilbiṣa kūṇitaḥ

original: tataḥ pradadhyau manasā nāgī saṃjīvanaṃ maṇim /
analyzed: tatas pradadhyau manasā nāgī saṃjīvanam maṇim

original: sa ca dhyātastayā satyā nāgalokātsamāyayau // Bhmj_14.167 //
analyzed: sa ca dhyātaḥ tayā satyā nāga lokāt samāyayau

original: spṛṣṭo 'tha hṛdaye tena jīvitaṃ prāpya phalguṇaḥ /
analyzed: spṛṣṭaḥ tha hṛdaye tena jīvitam prāpya phalguṇaḥ

original: citrāṅgadā ca sahasā śokaṃ tyaktvā hriyaṃ yayau // Bhmj_14.168 //
analyzed: citrāṅgadā ca sahasā śokam tyaktvā hriyam yayau
tatas nivedya vṛttāntam jagāda bhujaga ātmajā
ulūpī dhairya ladhim supta utthicam iva arjunam
śāpaḥ bhīṣma vadhāt eṣa dattaḥ te vasubhiḥ purā

original: ko 'nyathā tvāṃ raṇe śakto jetuṃ nirjitadhūrjaṭim // Bhmj_14.170 //
analyzed: kaḥ nyathā tvām raṇe śaktaḥ jetum nirjita dhūrjaṭim
mad pitā mayi vātsalyāt śāpitāḥ vasavaḥ ca te
ūcuḥ tvad śāpa nirvāṇam ratnam etat mahā prabham
śrutvā etat vismitaḥ pārthaḥ nāgīm citrāṅgadām tathā

original: parisāntvya śanaiḥ pūjāṃ jagrāha tanayārpitām // Bhmj_14.172 //
analyzed: parisāntvya śanais pūjām jagrāha tanaya arpitām
tatas tam dayitam vīraḥ putram āmantrya pāṇḍavaḥ
haya anusārī babhrāma vasudhām abdhi mekhalām
sa jitvā magadha adhīśam jarāsaṃdha ātmaja ātmajam
vaṅgān puṇḍrān kirātān ca dākṣiṇātyān sa māgadhān
gāndhārān saubala sutān rāja putrān prahāriṇaḥ

original: āgantavyaṃ makhe rājñaḥ sarvairityādideśa tān // Bhmj_14.175 //
analyzed: āgantavyam makhe rājñaḥ sarvaiḥ iti ādideśa tān
tatas pratinivṛttena turagena saha arjunaḥ
viveśa pūjitaḥ paurauḥ vijayī hastināpuram
haya utsargaḥ
tatas pravṛtte vidhivat yajñe kanaka varṣiṇaḥ
rājñaḥ muni jana ākīrṇe prāpteṣu akhila rājasu
jananyā saha bhūpāle saṃprāpte babhruvāhane
sa ādaram phalguṇa prītyā pūjite pāṇḍu nandanaiḥ
kriyām ahīnām vidadhe svayam satyavatī sutaḥ
haimam tatra abhavat sarvam iṣṭakā cayana ādikam
yūpa bhāṇḍa ghana sthālī paryaṅka gṛha toraṇam
deva ṛṣi siddha gandharva kiṃnarāḥ maṅgalam jaguḥ
karma antareṣu yajñasya nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
śamite paśu saṅghe ca turagam brāhmaṇa uttamāḥ
ālabhanta yathāśāstram upasaṃrodhya pārṣatīm
tatas te yājakāḥ tatra vapām uddhṛtya vājinaḥ

original: śrapayitvā śubhaṃ dhūmaṃ pāṇḍavebhyo nyavedayan // Bhmj_14.183 //
analyzed: śrapayitvā śubham dhūmam pāṇḍavebhyaḥ nyavedayan

original: tataḥ pūrṇe na vidhinā vyāsāya pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: tatas pūrṇe na vidhinā vyāsāya pṛthivīpatiḥ
catur samudra rasanām pṛthivīm dakṣiṇām
dattvā atha hema koṭīnām koṭim tad vacasā nṛpaḥ

original: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ punaḥ kṣoṇīṃ jagrāha muninārpitām // Bhmj_14.185 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ punar kṣoṇīm jagrāha muninā arpitām
pūjayitvā narendreṇa māna arheṣu atha rājasu
visṛṣṭeṣu abhavat kaḥ pi brahma saṅgha mahā utsavaḥ
babhūvuḥ tatra vāhinyaḥ madhunaḥ kṣīra sarpiṣām
babhuḥ ca kula śaila ābhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ modaka rāśayaḥ
dvijebhyaḥ dīyamāneṣu hema ratneṣu bhūbhujā

original: śakrāyudhairiva vyāptā diśo daśa cakāśire // Bhmj_14.188 //
analyzed: śakra āyudhaiḥ iva vyāptāḥ diśaḥ daśa cakāśire
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sa viduraḥ sañjayaḥ subala ātmajāḥ
tasthuḥ daivata vat tatra pūjyamānāḥ mahībhujā
yajñaḥ
atrā antare hema citra pārśvaḥ bila mukha udgataḥ
nakulaḥ laghu saṃcāraḥ yajña bhūmim upāyayau
sa manuṣya girā prāha janayan jana kautukam

original: aho nu saktṛprasthena na tulyo 'yaṃ mahāmakhaḥ // Bhmj_14.191 //
analyzed: aho nu saktṛ prasthena na tulyaḥ yam mahā makhaḥ

original: nūnaṃ dānakaṇaḥ śuddhaḥ kṛśo 'pi prathate nṛṇām /
analyzed: nūnam dāna kaṇaḥ śuddhaḥ kṛśaḥ u pi prathate nṛṇām
nūnam bahu draviṇa tā mithyā evā utsava ḍambaraḥ
iti bruvāṇaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sau vipraiḥ vismaya nirbharaiḥ

original: uvāca sraktuprasthasya māhātmyaṃ śrūyatāṃ dvijāḥ // Bhmj_14.193 //
analyzed: uvāca sraktuprasthasya māhātmyam śrūyatām dvijāḥ
śiloccha vṛttiḥ abhavat kurukṣetre purā dvijaḥ
viśuddha sattva draviṇaḥ kṛśaḥ bahu kuṭumbakaḥ
ghore kadācid durbhikṣe kṣīṇa vṛttiḥ cireṇa saḥ
kṛcchrāt kṣetra śatam bhrāntvā saktu prastham avāptavān
baiśvadevena vidhinā sa kṛtvā āvaśyakam gṛhe
kalatra sahitaḥ bhoktum prasthitaḥ paśyat arthinam

original: kṣutparītaḥ kṣudhākrāntaṃ sa taṃ dṛṣṭvātithiṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: kṣudh parītaḥ kṣudhā ākrāntam sa tam dṛṣṭvā atithim dvijaḥ
dadau svam aśanam tasmai saṃtoṣa viṣada āśayaḥ
tat bhuktvā na abhavat tasya kṣunna vṛttiḥ yadā arthinaḥ

original: tadbhāryā tatsutaścāsmai tatsnuṣā ca dadau tadā // Bhmj_14.198 //
analyzed: tad bhāryā tad sutaḥ ca asmai tad snuṣā ca dadau tadā
sarveṣām bhojanena atha tṛptaḥ saḥ tithiḥ abravīt

original: dharmastuṣṭo 'smi sattvena mahatī siddhirastu vaḥ // Bhmj_14.199 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ tuṣṭaḥ smi sattvena mahatī siddhiḥ astu vaḥ
iti uktvā antarhite tasmin vimānaiḥ taraṇi prabhaiḥ

original: saśarīrā divaṃ prāpuḥ sarve te ślāghyavṛttayaḥ // Bhmj_14.200 //
analyzed: sa śarīrāḥ divam prāpuḥ sarve te ślāghya vṛttayaḥ
atha aham saktu gandhena samāhūtaḥ bila āśrayaḥ
tām ucchiṣṭa bhuvam prāptaḥ bhuktavān yatra saḥ tithiḥ
tad pātra salila spṛṣṭam ekam pārśvam idam mama
luṭhitam hema ruciram jātam puṇyaiḥ iva āplutam
dvitīya pārśva cintā me katham haimam bhavet iti
babhūva su ciram tasmāt prāptaḥ ham vasudhādhipam
dvija lakṣa sahasrāṇām iha bhojana bhūmiṣu

original: bhrāntasyāpi na saṃjātaḥ ko 'pi kānto lavastanau // Bhmj_14.204 //
analyzed: bhrāntasya api na saṃjātaḥ kaḥ pi kāntaḥ lavaḥ tanau
tasmāt na saktu prasthasya sama tām arhati kratuḥ
iti uktvā nakulaḥ prāyāt citra kāntiḥ adarśanam
evam yajña sahasrebhyaḥ śreyasī bhāva śuddha tā

original: manasaḥ kila vaimalyaṃ paraṃ brahma pracakṣate // Bhmj_14.206 //
analyzed: manasaḥ kila vaimalyam param brahma pracakṣate
agastyasya purā satre viprāḥ dvādaśa vārṣike
śaśaṃsuḥ bhāvinīm ghorām anāvṛṣṭim parasparam
tatas gastyaḥ parityajya dravya yajñam mahāmatiḥ
cakāra stabdha manasā dhyāna yajñam tapaḥ nidhiḥ
saḥ eva vasu saṃpannaḥ sarva vid kṛta saṃnidhiḥ
kratuḥ babhūva yena indraḥ vavarṣa ānanda nirbharaḥ
śreyān sattva viśuddhasya pāṇḍavasya abhavat kratuḥ

original: kiṃ tu svakāryānnakulastatra cakre vimānanām // Bhmj_14.210 //
analyzed: kim tu sva kāryāt nakulaḥ tatra cakre vimānanām
jijñāsuḥ jamadagnim prāk svayam krodhaḥ śva vigrahaḥ

original: pasparśa jihvayā śrāddhe dhṛtaṃ hi piṭhire payaḥ // Bhmj_14.211 //
analyzed: pasparśa jihvayā śrāddhe dhṛtam hi piṭhire payaḥ
krodhaḥ yam iti vijñāya muniḥ tam jñāna locanaḥ

original: na śaśāpa tato bhītaḥ krodhaḥ kampākulo 'bhavat // Bhmj_14.212 //
analyzed: na śaśāpa tatas bhītaḥ krodhaḥ kampa ākulaḥ bhavat

original: tataste pitaraḥ kruddhā yeṣāṃ śrāddhe dhṛtaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: tatas te pitaraḥ kruddhāḥ yeṣām śrāddhe dhṛtam payaḥ

original: aśapansuciraṃ yena krodho nakulatāṃ yayau // Bhmj_14.213 //
analyzed: aśapan su ciram yena krodhaḥ nakula tām yayau
avamāna kathām kṛtvā svayam yaudhiṣṭhire kratau
śāpa kṣayam prāpsyasi iti taiḥ eva asya kṛtaḥ vadhiḥ
nakula upākhyānam  /
iti sakala narendraiḥ vandyamānasya rājñaḥ dvija jana paripuṣṭaḥ sattva puṣpa prakāraḥ
śubha phala nicaya ādyaḥ yajña saṃbhāra mūlaḥ carita taruḥ udāraḥ satya śākhaḥ rarāja
iti śrī kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām āśvamedhikam parva
